Non-Profit Organization Galia Collaborative

This is a non-profit organization that empowers the mental health in women by developing their mental strength and well-being. They state that “When women repurpose their power in pursuit of their dreams, we’re unstoppable.”

Non-Profit Organization The Body-Positive Organization

This is a non-profit organization that educates a lot of people around the world because of their physical appearance through a lot of programs and community services. They help people resist negative attitudes towards themselves.

Non-Profit Organization National Eating Disorder Association

This is a non-profit organization supports the individuals and families that are affected by eating disorders and that they also provide tips for people who are currently suffering in treatment and being able to have quality care.

Government Agency NYS - Office of Mental Health

This is a governmental agency that provides mental health services for people that are suffering from mental health issues. They oversee more than 4,500 programs and that they serve more 900,000 individuals each year.
